


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.dom -->

# ```js forceRedraw ```


Force the element to be painted again in case of visual issues

## Parameters

- **$elm**  HTMLElement: The HTMLElement to force the redraw on



## Example (js)

```js
import forceRedraw from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/dom/forceRedraw'
forceRedraw($elm)
```
